document_data.name: Belaurant
document_data.mainbody: '''Belaurant''' was one of the [[Nimbral Lords]]. He was an old and kindly but manipulative figure and one of the leading Elders.{{Cite web/Realmslore/The Realm of Nimbral, Part Eight: The Nimbral Lords}}
